resources.string:
Start the game by clicking the Start.
A random question will appear on the screen.
Pass the phone to the person who best fits the question.
This person reads the question aloud and then taps the screen to draw the next one.
Repeat the process, passing the phone to the next person.
Simple rules, lots of fun!

Next One is the perfect party game that breaks the ice and boosts the energy!
Funny and unexpected questions engage every participant.
Pass the phone, answer questions, and laugh until you cry.
Whether "you're " with friends or strangers â€” Next One will make every gathering unforgettable.
